name: Back 2 Basics
description:
Journal Entry #1394

After years of trying, I have finally harnessed time itself. With the watch I have invented, the wearer can revert to a younger version of themselves. This feature also automatically reverses the effects of death, taking the wearer back in time before they died. However, with this unprecedented achievement comes unforeseen consequences. Whenever I go back in time, my imaginary  friend from when I was a kid, Willow, becomes real — along with all those monsters I thought were under my bed all those years back.
